Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.MessageFromServer

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AskStrategy
    Message from server: it notifies the player that is obliged to use a specified strategy.
    ConvertedMarbles
    Message from server: it contains the remaining resources to redeem from market.
    CrashedPlayer
    Message from server: it contains the nickname of the player that has just crashed.
    DevCardSet
    Message from server containing all the development cards that can be bought.
    Error
    Message from server: it notifies the client that an error occurred.
    FirstTurnEnded
    Message from server: it notifies that the first turn has just ended.
    GameEnded
    Message from server: it notifies that the game is ended.
    GameStarted
    Message from server: the setup phase is ended.
    ItsYourTurn
    Message from server: it contains the nickname of the current player.
    JoinPlayer
    Message from server: it contains the nickname of a player that has just joined the game.
    KeepLeadercards
    Message from server: it contains the IDs of leader cards given by the game to the client that receives this message.
    LastTurn
    Message from server: it notifies that a specified player has triggered the last turn due to a specific reason.
    MarketGrid
    Message from server: it contains a matrix with all the marbles in the market and which marble is out.
    MessageFromServer
    Message object received from server.
    ModeRequest
    Message from server: it notifies the client that there are no waiting rooms available and he needs to set the size of a new game.
    NicknameAccepted
    Message from server: client that receives this message is notified that the nickname selected by him, has been accepted during the login phase.
    OkRoom
    Message from server: it contains the size of the waiting room and a list of nicknames of players that are waiting.
    Ping
    Message from server: used by the server to verify that the connection is still alive.
    PlayersOrder
    Message from server: it contains the a list containing the nicknames of the players that are playing the same game of the client, ordered by the turn order.
    RejoinPlayer
    Message from server: it contains the nickname of the player that has just rejoined the game.
    ResourceToPay
    Message from server: it contains the resources that remains to pay by the client.
    ResourceToPut
    Message from server: it contains the resources that remains to take from the market.
    SelectedLeadercards
    Message from server: it contains the IDs of the leader cards selected by the client at the beginning of the game.
    SelectedMarbles
    Message from server: it contains marbles obtained by the market.
    SelectPlaceCard
    Message from server: it notifies the player that the development card purchase process is ended.
    SelectResourceIn
    Message from server: it notifies the client that he can select the input resources for base and extra production.
    SelectResourceOut
    Message from server: it notifies the client that he can select the output resources for the base production.
    TurnOrder
    Message from server: notify the client how many resources can redeem at beginning of the game.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ErrorMessage
    This class translates all the key word errors that can be received from server.
